attributes.action: suport the BUAV and other bodies in ending the suffering and torture of all animals used in experimentation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pet owners love their pets, yet many of the products are derived from the suffering of animals. Cosmetics, cleaners, washing powder, the list is endless...  Despicable acts of cruelty and torture of animals are commonplace in the name of 'research' Support organisations such as the BUAV in ending this needless barbaric act by banning any experimentation on animals and the import of goods from companies that continue to test on any animal.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/animalsrequal/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
